<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105544</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202700</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Geometry Charades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie-Scharaden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Charades de la Géométrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Charades Da Geometria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Charades Della Geometria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλαβόγριφοι γεωμετρίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Charadas de la geometría</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The students will physically act out and demonstrate the meanings of various given geometric terms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kursteilnehmer fungieren physikalisch heraus 
und demonstrieren die Bedeutungen der verschiedenen gegebenen 
geometrischen Bezeichnungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants agiront physiquement dehors et 
démontreront les significations de diverses limites géométriques 
données.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes agirão fisicamente para fora e 
demonstrarão os meanings de vários termos geométricos dados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi si comporteranno fisicamente fuori e 
dimostreranno i significati di vari dati termini geometrici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα ενεργήσουν φυσικά έξω και θα 
καταδείξουν τις έννοιες των διάφορων δεδομένων γεωμετρικών όρων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes actuarán físicamente hacia fuera
y demostrarán los significados de varios términos geométricos 
dados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
